mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.group_id , t1.group_name , t1.group_state , t1.task_id , t1.task_name , t1.bean_id , t1.deal_step , t1.pre_step , t1.pre_step_state , t1.auto_exec , t1.deal_chance , t1.validate_state , t1.created_by , t1.created , t1.last_upd_by , t1.last_upd , t1.remark from quartz_task_group_def t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update quartz_task_group_def t1 set t1.group_id =#{dto.groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.group_name =#{dto.groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.group_state =#{dto.groupState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.task_id =#{dto.taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.task_name =#{dto.taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.bean_id =#{dto.beanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.deal_step =#{dto.dealStep,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.pre_step =#{dto.preStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.pre_step_state =#{dto.preStepState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.auto_exec =#{dto.autoExec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.deal_chance =#{dto.dealChance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.validate_state ='1', t1.last_upd_by =#{dto.opUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.last_upd =sysdate, t1.remark =#{dto.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from quartz_task_group_def t1 where t1.group_id in (#{ids} )
delete from quartz_task_group_def t1 where t1.id not in (#{ids} ) and t1.group_id=#{groupId}
mapper.update: update quartz_task_group_def t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
update quartz_task_group_def set is_end=#{isEnd} where TASK_NAME=#{taskName}
